hero.desc: My name is Vanja, and I'm a Frontend Developer from Obrenovac, Serbia.

edu.title: My education
edu.desc: At the IT Academy I learned the basics of programming, and I also learned how to use the most popular programming language and its frameworks. React & Next were the main focus of the course.

phoenix.desc: Developed applications with React, Next, TypeScript, Rest as well as worked in TailwindCSS to create solid User Interfaces. Consulted with the product manager to identify main features and goals and decomposed feature set into small scoped components Wrote maintainable and extensible code in a team environment, worked closely with Backend, Design and QA teams. Implemented Redux cart from scratch, speeding up the appâ€™s performance by 300%. Attended meetings with clients to ensure every goal is met in record time. Designed the client side structure, and folder architecture on project used by thousands of people.

bibo.desc: Used the best instructional methods to provide engaging learning and assistance to English students. Used audio-visual aids as well as technology to deliver Literature and cultural lessons. Offered one-on-one assistance and additional tutoring to students after classes. Encouraged student participation in class and motivated them to work hard and practice better.
